result.eng: On Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ga: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.orig: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.html: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċoṁairle Ṫomáis aontaíoḋ gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.

result.eng: There is nothing we can do about the power of the media.
result.ga: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.orig: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.html: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meánThere is nothing we can do about the power of the media.

result.html: Fanfaimid go meán laeWe'll wait till midday.

result.html: Is é 94 6% an meán náisiúntaThe national average is 94.6%.

result.eng: The applications must be in by midday.
result.ga: Ní mór na hiarratais a bheith istigh faoi mheán lae

result.eng: Sport is more visible nowadays thanks to the media.
result.ga: Tá an spórt níos feiceálaí ar na saolta seo a bhuí leis na meáin
result.orig: Tá an spórt níos feiceálaí ar na saolta seo a bhuí leis na meáin

result.eng: I speak to my friends at midday.

result.html: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.

result.html: Meán Fómhair seo chugainnThis coming September.
result.ponchtml: Meán Fóṁair seo ċugainnThis coming September.

result.eng: The needs are putting the blame on us.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as

result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
